price: 2. Welnee, degenen die ongelovig zijn verkeren in een valse trots en tegenstand.
arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي عِزَّةٖ وَشِقَاقٖ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: bali alladhīna kafarū fī ʿizzatin washiqāqin
